Uses of Package
com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster

  • Packages that use com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.dw
    Package that contains basic components needed to run a ClusterMate-based service on DropWizard container.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.jaxrs
    Package that contains glue code between "native" interface storage system exposes, and JAX-RS container itself: mostly just resource end points.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cleanup  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.servlet  
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.store
    Package that contains functionality that implements access to the actual distributed data store.
    com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.sync  
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.dw 
    Class and Description
    ClusterInfoHandler
    Handler that provides information about current cluster state, as seen by this node, as well as handles simple update notifications.
    ClusterViewByServer
    Class that defines information that service components need to access, wrt state of cluster as seen from perspective of a single service node.
    ClusterViewByServerUpdatable
    Intermediate class that exposes additional callback methods for components that need to feed back cluster status updates.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.jaxrs 
    Class and Description
    ClusterViewByServer
    Class that defines information that service components need to access, wrt state of cluster as seen from perspective of a single service node.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.bdb 
    Class and Description
    ActiveNodeState
    POJO used for exchanging node state information between servers; also stored in the local database.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cleanup 
    Class and Description
    ClusterViewByServer
    Class that defines information that service components need to access, wrt state of cluster as seen from perspective of a single service node.
  • Classes in com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster used by com.fasterxml.clustermate.service.cluster 
    Class and Description
    ActiveNodeState
    POJO used for exchanging node state information between servers; also stored in the local database.
    ClusterPeer
    Object that contains active state about a single peer for the local node.
    ClusterPeerImpl 
    ClusterViewByServer
    Class that defines information that service components need to access, wrt state of cluster as seen from perspective of a single service node.
    ClusterViewByServerImpl 
    ClusterViewByServerUpdatable
    Intermediate class that exposes additional callback methods for components that need to feed back cluster status updates.
